abstract: James W. Breyer, a prominent venture capitalist, will be nominated to the News Corporation board, the company said. Two longtime board members, Kenneth E. Cowley and Thomas J. Perkins, are leaving.
snippet: James W. Breyer, a prominent venture capitalist, will be nominated to the News Corporation board, the company said. Two longtime board members, Kenneth E. Cowley and Thomas J. Perkins, are leaving.
lead_paragraph: 7:24 p.m. | Updated The News Corporation’s board of directors underwent significant reshuffling on Friday with the departure of two long-serving members and the nomination of a new independent voice.

headline.main: News Corp. Board Undergoes a Shuffle

byline.original: By Jeremy W. Peters and Matt Richtel
